content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Greetings, Maryam. Although our background may differ, regarding the apartment discussion, let us focus solely on the rental price at this moment. I have high expectations for this property, so I'm open to hearing your proposed amount first. When you offer a figure satisfactory to me, I'll respond with 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' if we reach an agreement, or 'TERMINATE' if not.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
